attributes.action: If UK leaves EU give £350 million more a week to NHS
attributes.additional_details:
See the picture of the Vote Leave NHS promise here:
https://twitter.com/MichaelPDeacon/status/747000584226607104
attributes.background:
Vote Leave had a big bus and adverts that said "Let's give our NHS the £350 million the EU takes every week"

This should be on top of all other planned NHS funding increases.
